channel.title: What im developing with some positions!
channel.description:
I am currently in need of a team to work on a new private server, It's called Project-Xml We will be using Ip Board.
The team will consist of the following:
2x Website Designers 2x Graphical Effects artists 3x 317 Project Insanity coders Any skill not mentioned here you can try to apply for (Please do not apply for in-game staff[Forum staff applications may be accepted]) The server is based on distant project insanity, 317 of course. We have 614 items with working specs and animations. We have 11,257 NPCs in total with all working animations and gfx and attack styles.
Features:
-Perfect Full Screen -Construction (Still Needs A little Work) -639 Skill Interface -Added Curses. -Great Bridding / Switching System -Vote4Cash Command -Webclient Ready -Soulwars Cape -Torva and Pernix -Critical Hits -Fixed Slayer -Ring of Life Effects -Skillcape Emotes -602 Animations and 614 Items, 317 NPCS -New Rendering Methods for textures -Chaotic Item Sets -Dungeoneering Teleport GFX including use of Kinship Ring -Updated Maps -614 Items -Korasi Sword
To apply for anything use this template:
Nickname: Age: MSN or Skype name: Country: Position applying for: Past experience: Hours available per day: Dear Flamers/Haters:
My Skype-Zman2481 Link to photos-http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,548677.0.html

item.title: What im developing with some positions!

item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

If you’re looking for a development team, post this in the development teams section.

Read full topic
item.source: What im developing with some positions!

item.title: What im developing with some positions!
item.dc:creator: @Xml_Zach Xml Zach
item.description:
@Xml_Zach wrote:

I am currently in need of a team to work on a new private server, It’s called Project-Xml
We will be using Ip Board.

The team will consist of the following:

2x Website Designers
2x Graphical Effects artists
3x 317 Project Insanity coders
Any skill not mentioned here you can try to apply for (Please do not apply for in-game staff[Forum staff applications may be accepted])
The server is based on distant project insanity, 317 of course.
We have 614 items with working specs and animations.
We have 11,257 NPCs in total with all working animations and gfx and attack styles.

Features:

-Perfect Full Screen
-Construction (Still Needs A little Work)
-639 Skill Interface
-Added Curses.
-Great Bridding / Switching System
-Vote4Cash Command
-Webclient Ready
-Soulwars Cape
-Torva and Pernix
-Critical Hits
-Fixed Slayer
-Ring of Life Effects
-Skillcape Emotes
-602 Animations and 614 Items, 317 NPCS
-New Rendering Methods for textures
-Chaotic Item Sets
-Dungeoneering Teleport GFX including use of Kinship Ring
-Updated Maps
-614 Items
-Korasi Sword

To apply for anything use this template:

Nickname:
Age:
MSN or Skype name:
Country:
Position applying for:
Past experience:
Hours available per day:
Dear Flamers/Haters:

My Skype-Zman2481 Link to photos-http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,548677.0.html
